The final version of Microsoft Enterprise Library 5.0 Integration Pack for Windows Azure has been released. Therefore, this package intended for preview and beta testing is effectively deprecated in favour of the final release (5.0.1118).
You can uninstall this package.

For the list of the final NuGet packages, search for 'elazure' through the NuGet Package Manager.

For the list of changes and fixes go to: http://entlib.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=ELAzureFinalChangeLog
Documentation and additional resources are available at: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh680918(v=pandp.50).aspx
The most up-to-date version of the release notes is available online: http://entlib.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=EntLib5Azure
